name: Little Cleaner (unSAME Studio)
description:
Humans are throwing all sorts of stuff that doesn't belong in the sewer into the sewer pipes. Help the little rat Tata to protect the sewer. Move your body and hit the incoming trashes back to the pipe!

[ Control ]

Support both Keyboard + Mouse and Gamepad.

A and D / Left Joystick to Move

Q and E / LT and RT to Dash

Left Click or Space / Controller A to Hit

( If you don't like repeated button clicking, try turning on "Auto Hit" in the settings!)

[ About ]

Little Cleaner is an experimental game I made around the production of Runway™. Originally designed for mobile. The assets from this game are reused in many other projects I made during the past few years. I decided to finish the game and put it out so people try this fun little game!

- Sam Feng

[ Creator ]

Sam Feng - Programming, Arts, Music - @samfenggames
